name: P.E.T. Pursuit
description:
A cat has been transformed into the ultimate hunter in a last attempt to save their owner.

Travel and fight through the ruins of the planet where your owner is being held to try to save them.

-Press 4 or F4 for fullscreen
-Press 1 or 2 to change resolution

Keyboard
-WASD or Arrow Keys to move and jump
-Left click mouse to use weapon
-Mouse wheel to switch itemsController
-Left stick to move
-X to jump
-Right stick to aim
-Left shoulder to jump
-Right shoulder to use weapon
-Left and Right Back Shoulders to switch items Credits

Game by E.E-Wick

With music by OrangeCloud
